```{r setup, message=FALSE}



library(covid19br)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)

states <- downloadCovid19("states") %>%
  filter(date == max(date)) %>%
  add_geo()


ggplot(states) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = log(accumDeaths))) 

ggplot(states) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = log(accumDeaths))) +
  scale_fill_gradient2(low = "red", high = "red", na.value = NA)

```
